messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] "in the moment"
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/15/2006 3:39:59 P.M. Eastern Standard Time, crissyhall@yahoo.com writes: Leslie,  thank you so much for your suggestions on being in the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/15/2006 3:39:59 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,
crissyhall@... writes:

Leslie, thank you so much for your suggestions on "being in the
moment". I've started really watching my kids and it *really* does
help. I have Eckhart Tolle on reserve at the library now :).

Danielle, wow on your revision of the "Mean Mom", it really shows the
difference of unschooling




********

You are welcome! I read the other day, coincidentally, that watching
children is a great relaxation/mediatation. Wish I could remember where, but I've
been going through a ton of books lately (my mom is getting rid of them).

I hope you enjoy the Eckhart Tolle. Let me know what you think!

Danielle, I also appreciate your revision! Excellent!

Leslie in SC


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
Leslie, thank you so much for your suggestions on "being in the
moment". I've started really watching my kids and it *really* does
help. I have Eckhart Tolle on reserve at the library now :).

Danielle, wow on your revision of the "Mean Mom", it really shows the
difference of unschooling
